title: GJ Riot
body:
Your fucking servers are A+

Everyone in the game can't move.

Keep up the good work

replies.body: If you really wanted the issue to be resolved you are going about it in the incorrect manner.

> [{quoted}](name=Musterpulse,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=NEVaA60b,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-22T11:39:36.015+0000)
>
> If you really wanted the issue to be resolved you are going about it in the incorrect manner.

Do you really think I expect Riot to "resolve" it?

The same company who can't even fix some of their glaringly broken champions?
ah yes, cause making a qq thread %%%%%ing about the servers in a sarcastic manner is helping completely.

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=NEVaA60b,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-22T10:46:19.302+0000)
>
> ah yes, cause making a qq thread %%%%%ing about the servers in a sarcastic manner is helping completely.

So is 9 people in my game being forced to sit at fountain because Riot servers.

moron

> [{quoted}](name=Flarefox,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=NEVaA60b,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-01-22T10:49:07.622+0000)
>
> So is 9 people in my game being forced to sit at fountain because Riot servers.
> 
> moron

not sure how that makes me a moron. but I guess I'll never understand people that complain about minor problems on boards.

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=NEVaA60b,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-22T10:54:00.616+0000)
>
> not sure how that makes me a moron. but I guess I'll never understand people that complain about minor problems on boards.

Minor?

The game is still going on for 30 mins with MAJOR lag spikes for both teams

It's like playing on EUW. You can't move for 10 seconds at a time, randomly

GJ Flarefox

Your %%%%ing discussion is A+

Everyone on the boards doesn't care.

Keep up the good work
